Literature.Title: Two distinct amphipathic peptide antibiotics with systemic efficacy.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2020;117:19446-19454
Literature.Author: Lakshmaiah Narayana J, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Wu Q, Chhonker YS, Zhang Y, Zarena D, Salnikov ES, Dang X, Wang F, Murphy C, Foster KW, Gorantla S, Bechinger B, Murry DJ, Wang G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=130 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:LD50=>80 µM,Human hepatocyte cells HepaRG:LD50=>80 µM,Human lung fibroblasts MRC-9:LD50=>25 µM,Mouse splenocytes:LD50=12.5 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus M838-17(MIC=3.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa E411-17(MIC=4-8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae E406-17(MIC=8-16µM),Staphylococcus aureus MU50(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 200(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=2-4µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 400(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=4µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=8-16µM),Enterococcus faecium V286-17(MIC=2µM),Acinetobacter baumannii B28-16(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli E423-17(MIC=2µM)
